user_input: I'm building a smart home system.
ai_response: To build a smart home system, you will need components such as a microcontroller (e.g., Arduino or Raspberry Pi), Wi-Fi modules (e.g., ESP8266), relays for controlling appliances, and sensors (e.g., motion sensors, light sensors)...
A relay is an electrically operated switch that allows you to control a high-power circuit with a low-power signal...
